title: Chilwell
author: Chilwell
content: EFCC do dey tell pipo to calm down say watin dey see recently, di recent post wey dey see for social media na fake news be dat, make pipo no panic, not is happening like dat, even the department wey dey write there no even dey for there office so calm down all na lie lie. Effcc Don give warning to does wey dey form this fake information say everyday is for thief one day is for owners. Link. https://twitter.com/officialefcc/status/1676286776988557312?s=46&t=qJXYidUv-9dGH9cW3Joe_A
